meanings.definition: Resembling a doughnut in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The round cake was doughnutlike with a hole in the center.
meanings.sent2: The doughnutlike pastry was covered in colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent3: The doughnutlike balloon popped when it hit the sharp edge.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a doughnutlike bun on top of her head.
meanings.sent5: The doughnutlike cloud floated lazily in the sky.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities of a doughnut.
meanings.sent1: The sweet aroma filled the room, making it smell doughnutlike.
meanings.sent2: The doughnutlike texture of the pillow made it soft and fluffy.
meanings.sent3: The doughnutlike car had a shiny exterior and a comfortable interior.
meanings.sent4: His smile was warm and doughnutlike, spreading joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The doughnutlike toy was squishy and fun to play with.
